broker_host.title: MQTT Broker Host
broker_host.description: The host of the broker to connect to.

use_tls.title: Use TLS
use_tls.description: Whether to use TLS encryption on the connection.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username which is used for the connection.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password associated with this username.

topic_pattern.title: Topic Pattern
topic_pattern.description: Topic pattern in which the records will be sent. You can use patterns like '{namespace}' and/or '{stream}' to send the message to a specific topic based on these values. Notice that the topic name will be transformed to a standard naming convention.

topic_test.title: Test Topic
topic_test.description: Topic to test if Airbyte can produce messages.

client.title: Client ID
client.description: The client identifier that is unique on the server being connected to.

publisher_sync.title: Sync Publisher
publisher_sync.description: Wait synchronously until the record has been sent to the broker.

connect_timeout.title: Connect Timeout
connect_timeout.description: Maximum time interval (in seconds) the client will wait for the network connection to the MQTT server to be established.

automatic_reconnect.title: Automatic Reconnect
automatic_reconnect.description: Whether the client will automatically attempt to reconnect to the server if the connection is lost.

clean_session.title: Clean Session
clean_session.description: Whether the client and server should remember state across restarts and reconnects.

message_retained.title: Message Retained
message_retained.description: Whether or not the publish message should be retained by the messaging engine.

message_qos.title: Message QoS
message_qos.description: Quality of Service used for each message to be delivered.
